name: Six Channel Module
summary: A 6CM file is a six-channel audio module created by Triton Fasttracker, a popular music tracker software from the 1990s. It stores audio tracks with six separate channels in Fasttracker's proprietary Six Channel Module (6CM) format. Musicians and sound designers primarily used Fasttracker to create electronic music and retro video game sound effects.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
